text:
Lyric | www.staylyric.com | San Francisco, CA | Full Time | Onsite

We are hiring for: Principal Data Engineer, Principal Data Engineer, Senior Backend Engineer, Senior Salesforce Developer, Senior Software Engineer, Staff Backend Engineer, Staff Full Stack Engineer

https://boards.greenhouse.io/lyric

Lyric's Creative Suites are your launchpad to a better travel experience, combining the spaciousness of an apartment, the amenities of a 4-star hotel, the productivity of your favorite work space with (soon to be) IOT integration, and the creative surroundings of an artistic studio.
